info.title: Click here to begin the termination request process
info.text1: An initiated termination request for all specimens will pause your billing for 30 days to give you time to complete any required documentation to complete the termination request.
info.text2: If you need additional storage time beyond 30 days, you will be billed for an additional annual storage period from the end of your previous billing period.
info.alternativeText1: No specimens for termination at this time.
info.alternativeText2: Please contact support if you have any questions.
